title: Posted a link to the apple girl page on gd wiki in response to a comment about the topic
body:
Instant 1 day ban. 

Don't know what I expected. Obviously the mods are going to stick to their guns on something they already (mistakenly) made a call on as being inappropriate. Maybe I thought that because the image wouldn't show up in the post and you'd have to read through the link to see the picture there wouldn't be an issue or maybe I thought the mods would think critically for themselves on the matter and realize that, in retrospect, it was a dumb call in the first place. What I didn't expect was for someone on the boards to be a dick and instant report the post and get me banned within less than a minute.
